data.comment: Danilo Fernandes (Internacional) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The big names in today's match at Estadio Beira-Rio have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Porto Alegre, Abel Hernandez (Internacional) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 2, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Heitor for Internacional drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 4, Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Porto Alegre.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Internacional's Thiago Galhardo is on target but unsuccessful.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Abel Hernandez.
In the minute 7, Great play from Patrick to set up the goal.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Rodrigo Lindoso (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 10, Willian Arao is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 11, Willian Arao returns to the field for Flamengo after picking up a slight injury.
Pedro grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Mauricio Isla instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 13, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Flamengo throw-in in Internacional's half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 16, Free kick Internacional.
Thiago Maia (Flamengo) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Thiago Galhardo is on target to give Internacional a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Internacional.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 29, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Natan (Flamengo) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Flamengo.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 37, Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 38, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 41, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo has run offside.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Vitinho for Flamengo has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Flamengo throw-in in Internacional's half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Internacional throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Edenilson (Internacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half is over at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 45, Flamengo's Gustavo Henrique has been booked in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Marcos Guilherme hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Internacional!
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 51, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo's Pedro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 55, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
Flamengo pushes forward through Vitinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Flamengo.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo drives forward and Pedro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 58, Filipe Luis hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Flamengo.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 60, Flamengo drive forward but Mauricio Isla is judged offside.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In Porto Alegre Internacional attack through Patrick. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Edenilson, who is grimacing with pain.
Edenilson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 64, Free kick in a good position for Flamengo!
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Vitinho (Flamengo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Flamengo push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Pedro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 68, Rodrigo Dourado is replacing Abel Hernandez for the home team.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 69, Internacional have a goal kick.
Internacional make their second substitution with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Marcos Guilherme.
Marcelo Lomba (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick Flamengo.
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Natan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Thiago Galhardo for Internacional has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 75, Rodrigo Moledo (Internacional) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Flamengo's Gustavo Henrique gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Gerson (Flamengo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 76, Internacional have a goal kick.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rodrigo Dourado (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 78, Wilton Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Thiago Galhardo for Internacional is still down.
Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) has taken off Thiago Galhardo who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. William Pottker is the replacement.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 82, Flamengo's Willian Arao has been booked in Porto Alegre and will miss the next match through suspension.
The home team replace Uendel with Damian Musto.
The home team have replaced Rodrigo Lindoso with Moises. This is the fifth substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael is on a sub for Willian Arao for Flamengo.
In the minute 88, Lincoln is on a sub for Vitinho for Flamengo.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Flamengo's Gustavo Henrique attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Pedro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Internacional throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
Everton Ribeiro (Flamengo) levels the match at 2-2 with a header.
Gerson with an assist there.
The away team replace Pedro with Leo Pereira.
